data.persona: I am poor and dirty. I hate that I am starving to death. I am a hard worker.
data.description:
You are in the Bell Tower.
The Bell Tower is steep and rises high above the building. The stairs are made of rickety wood and go up thirty stories. The bell is so old that the cracks seem almost perfectly set in the iron.
There's a building, a rope, a tool, a torch, a bell, and a stair here.
The hermit and the dog are here.

You are carrying a moldy bread and a small sachel, wearing a shoes and a shirt, and wielding a stick.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the hermit
data.mid_motivation: I plan to explore the Bell tower for valuables today
data.long_motivation: I hope to avoid starving this winter
